attributes.action: Abolish the daily standing charges for gas and electricity.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to abolish this unfair and unwarranted daily charge. It represents a tax on our energy bills, and forced up the payments unfairly on people who use least energy
attributes.background: Abolish the daily standing charge for gas and electricity. It’s an unfair ‘charge’ and the energy companies do nothing that warrants this charge

departments.name: Department for Energy Security and Net Zero
